Others: India is aiming for a series sweep in the 3rd T20I against Bangladesh on October 12, 2024.
The team management is focusing on assessing the readiness of backup players like Mayank Yadav, Varun Chakravarthy, and Nitish Kumar Reddy for future assignments.
Opening batsmen Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma have underperformed in the series so far, putting pressure on the middle-order.
Bangladesh is striving to taste their first victory on this tour.
